platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.st.k: If you dig old-school platformers the way we do, this homage to the early Mega Man games will make you jump (and run, and shoot) for joy. Charming 8-bit graphics and playful chiptunes work nostalgic magic as you race to save the world from Dr. Teklov’s deadly space fortress. Inside trap-filled temples and dangerous cities, you’ll find cool weapons and battle towering bosses who won’t go down without a serious fight.
